patterns: what is the teaching style of this college?
Is the teaching pattern different from other college?
responses:
Our college has different teaching patterns than other colleges of Tamil Nadu. We adopt a British teaching methodology, following the LTW techniques which stands for Lecture, Tutorial and Workshop.
You can provide us with your contact details and our counselors shall reach out to you and provide you with further details.
There are formative assessments daily which will be considered for internal marks. There are also Periodic Tests, Reports and assignments that will be considered for the mark allotment.
You can message us here at any hours. But our college premises will be open from 09:00 am to 05:00 pm only.

 Also our college has basketball court, badminton court, table tennis, chess, carrom board and many more refreshment zones.
